title: Zelensky says Russia is planning more mass strikes on Ukraineâ€™s energy infrastructure.
dc:creator: Carly Olson

media:content.media:credit: Brendan Hoffman for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: A worker installed a backup water line from Kyiv to the suburb of Hostomel on Friday that was powered by gravity and would function without electricity, as Ukraine struggles to cope with Russian attacks on its infrastructure.
